item.title: Bdd
item.description: What is Behavior Driven Development? Behavior Driven Development (BDD) is a branch of Test Driven Development (TDD). BDD uses human-readable descriptions of software user requirements as the basis for software tests. Introduction of BDD from Konstantin Kudryashov, the creator of Behat YouTube Reference Behat

item.title: Learn, todo and done 13-17/7/20
item.description: Learn BDD Behat Unit test Functional test Todo Update PR #464 for Issue #462 Done Reference Introduction to BDD with Behat Sandi Metz, OO code Bob Martin, TDD
